text: usake baad yoosuph ne dua kee ai paravaradigaar toone mujhe mulk bhee ata pharamaaya aur mujhe khvaab kee baaton kee taabeer bhee sikhaee ai aasamaan aur zameen ke paida karane vaale too hee mera maalik saraparast hai duniya mein bhee aur aakhirat mein bhee too mujhe (duniya se) musalamaan uthaaye aur mujhe neko kaaron mein shaamil pharama
